mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, phone, birthday, type FROM users
mapper.update: UPDATE FROM users SET pw = #{pw}, name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birthday = #{birthday}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, pw, name, phone, birthday, email, type, idx, icon_num) VALUES(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{birthday}, #{email} ,#{type}, (select nvl(max(idx),0)+1 from users), #{icon_num})
